description: This rustic, vintage-style country restaurant run by the Alajmo brothers stands on the banks of the Sile river, just a few minutes from the Venetian lagoon, and overlooks a vegetable garden, vineyard and beautiful green meadows. The cuisine demonstrates a strong focus on seasonal, regional ingredients, featuring meat and fish alike, with vegetables taking centre stage in many of the dishes.
